1094040.name: Voltron: Cubes Of Olkarion - Founder's Pack
1094040.description:
Founder's Pack


Prove your support for the Paladins with our legendary Founder's Pack!

This DLC includes the following items for you to showcase your superfandom to other players:
-Alternative costumes for Lance, Keith, Pidge, Shiro and Hunk
-Exclusive star-field background for your player character
-A sparkly deep space variant of the Castle of Lions Base
-An exclusive Founder's Badge that displays your support for the game when playing online multiplayer matches

All items in the Founder's Pack are purely cosmetic and have no effect on gameplay.

Important: This content requires the base game Voltron: Cubes of Olkarion on Steam in order to play.
